message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet high standards and deliver exceptional performance. This product comes with a comprehensive set of features that cater to various needs. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive item to you for $100. Let me know if you're interested in exploring further!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $60 to $80. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Thank you for understanding.
